metadata.title: CVE-2020-14393 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
A buffer overflow was found in perl-DBI < 1.643 in DBI.xs. A local attackerwho is able to supply a string longer than 300 characters could cause anout-of-bounds write, affecting the availability of the service or integrityof data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbi-perl - 1.643-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.643-2').
